backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence file documenting a domain‑slug update and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for major frontend files used for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML with domain‑slug meta tag and script bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the IP lookup page and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIpLookup.ts: React Query mutation wrapping fetchIpInfo for on‑demand IP or domain lookups.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder noting no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorIp.ts: React Query hook fetching the visitor's own IP with optional details.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles with custom warm color tokens and dark‑mode variants plus utility extensions.
frontend/src/lib/ipLookup.ts: Validation helpers for IP/domain inputs and a fetcher for ipapi.co with error handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app bootstrap with QueryClient and Internet Identity provider setup.
frontend/src/pages/IpLookupPage.tsx: Full IP lookup UI with visitor IP display, lookup form, toggleable details, and loading/error states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme utilities.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing versions, deployment slug issues, and existing feature requirements for the app named 'ip look up'.
